Name: Project Mercury
About the game: Set in a bleak neon future, Project Mercury puts you on foot, on a hoverbike, up skyscrapers, and down bottomless pits, as you exterminate a threat of unknown origin! Game Features Eight stages that will put you on foot, riding on a hoverbike, scaling skyscrapers, and floating down chasms. State-of-the-Art high fidelity graphics at a 256x224 native resolution. A rich soundtrack that only five-channel chipmusic can provide. Nine boss battles to make your blood boil. Three weapons modules to help you on your mission. Battery-powered save features to keep your progress.
